TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartAddingEventHandler(object sender, WebPartAddingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartAddingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartAddingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartAddingEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartAddingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartAddingEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 对象的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发之前将控件添加到 Web 部件区域的方法。The event is raised by the method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone. 此事件提供了机会在完成之前取消过程。This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete. 事件时调用后控件添加到 Web 部件区域。The event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone. 中指定的方法时，将调用委托引发事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a event is raised. 页开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartAdding`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
